channel.title: Sketching on Wsl Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Sketching on Wsl Blog

item.title: Reviving the Blog
item.description: At the time of writing this, I’m sitting in a small camper trailer just off the Pacific ocean in Oregon. Rain is drizzling down in intermittent bursts, pounding on the metal roof, and when the rain stops a jay outside starts “singing” his boisterous song. I’ve recently relocated to the Pacific Northwest - my job had a position that needed filling on the Oregon Coast, how could I turn down that opportunity?
